biotools.summary: Can be used for replica exchange calculations with sander. This package also facilitates other Amber tasks, such as dealing in a consistent way with an ensemble of conformations, massaging PDB files, and carrying out some common types of structural analysis.

bioschemas.name: MMTSB toolset
bioschemas.summary: Can be used for replica exchange calculations with sander. This package also facilitates other Amber tasks, such as dealing in a consistent way with an ensemble of conformations, massaging PDB files, and carrying out some common types of structural analysis.
